body: Just did some research of the title, it might be the combination of "Itai" means "painful", and "Amai" means "sweet", "painfully sweet" or "bitter sweet". Reading this is heartwarming because of how "sweet" this is, then suddenly hit you with a not-so-sure "painful" NTR. It's possible that the NTR is just fake/misunderstanding/delusion, and only use as a kind of trope for this series but I never read anything like that before. It doesn't matter anyway, fake or real, I don't want to feel shitty while feeling happy, I'm not a masochist for that kind of shit. Don't get me wrong, I'm not an NTR hater, I love Cheating because it is arousingly immoral and I love my Vanilla if it is erotic and wholesome, but I don't want both at the same time, people can do few things at a time, I can't cum while crying lol, it's a phycological suicide. NOT RECOMMENDED, there are so many great NTR and Vanilla out there, don't waste it on this one.
My guy is at the peek of his life

And on page 11, once translated, we'll read that it was a misunderstanding. You're the kind of person who believes anything you see, huh? Get your facts straight you fucking retard.

Well, chapter 4 is already out and new volume of Ananga Ranga should be scanned within a few days - we will all probably know more by then ;)

@faq you Using google translate on page 11 of 361650, we find out that it was all just a misunderstanding. That man that came out after her was actually a chef-in-training and all he wanted to do was offer her a drink that he made. The girl found it cute that her teacher was jealous and so she wanted to apologize for the misunderstanding by having sex. Go read 244786 if you want to be cucked so badly.

idk why people think this an ntr, i've read ch3 and the ntr "sequence" was just mc's imagination, he was being possessive and he imagine the worst case scenario, chill bruh ion think this would be an ntr it be stupid anyway and a man that has this kind of talent wouldn't be that stupid ig
Everone sadly this shit is NTR, here the chapter 3 : 361650

I think this will be another NTR. Just look at the cover, a dark skinned muscular man banging the girl inside the bath. The MC here is white and not that muscular and the author's past work really gives the future plot of this series.
has it been confirmed that the guy on the cover is the MC? cause it definetly doesnt look like him

@DarkestLight95 I'd really appreciate it if you do not take what I said as an attack of some sort that you had to retaliate to with ad hominems. Im not sure how you exactly mistook my words, but I said it was an advice and I just used this author as an example. Basically, I was suggesting to make it a habit to look through the author and have a grasp on how he writes his stuff esp in the recent ones before investing your time on a doujin. From how I see it, you are quite invested on this one and it seems like youre not quite a satisfied customer. So best to be extra prepared when you read something next time. Can't hate what you read if you don't read it in the first place. That's basically my point. If what I said doesn't apply to you, Im sure it wouldn't hurt to respond normally.

Since there's only three chapters out so far, with only a hint of NTR and even though the girl did say that the chef-in-training only wanted her to try out a drink that he's made, and that the author did make some past NTR, I don't think this will turn into NTR. I hope that I'm right though because if this is kept vanilla, this would be a really good vanilla.

@DrinksandDame I dont wanna spam this section with useless side discussion but , did you read my "long " post ?
Well, since according to your comment, you enjoy NTR or the likes, it doesnt surprise me you have some mental disturbancies.
I said that this is most likely ntr because "" With that cover, ----the artist past works-----, and plot""

So yes, i did check, he has some wholesome and some ntr stuff. But as soon as someone does unwholesome stuff, (unless its  revenge plot), he lost he value as a human being, so did the people who enjoy it (you ?)

@DarkestLight95 As a general advice, I think you need to check the authors' previous works before even investing your time into a doujin they made. Doujin authors tend to focus solely on specific genres for specific audiences. For this one specifically, he definitely doesn't make pure vanilla stories. If that on its own is already red flag to you, then you'll save a lot of your time and effort reading a work that you'll just end up hating. I mean, if you got the time to type long comments, then surely you have the time to click the artist's name and scroll a bit right?

Actually, this is either a trash NTR or the biggest bait I ever see. The chapter 3 is not translated yet so that is also yet to give any leads.
After a re-read, its even more suspect, in a very stupid NTR braindamaged away. Normally I prefer vanilla stuff, and if its not, then I go to the jap version to not get bothered by the bad plot and just get some art, but the art in this one is not that good, so if its really ntr, then what a shitty content this is.

I don't want to assume too much but if it is indeed just your make up story, I will assume that you used the summaries I commented in the raw uploads to produce fake spoilers, and that's rude bruh.

Since it looks like there is something going on in chapter 3, like @Googlemebitch said, the cover looks like NTR and the title itself translates directly to "painful sweet", I lean to it being NTR. Have no idea where they've found the full thing, since online release is on chapter 3, but it's not unheard of for a physical book being released in full, before piecemeal online release schedule. A pity.

Glad some mention the missing tags, not surprising since whoever uploaded only added two tags. That's a red flag right there. There are so many tags on this site there is no reason ever to have only 2 or even 3.
I doubt a full-blown NTR will happen in this kind of "comedic" doujin but I have been wrong before.

I search on Hitomi and even on the official site, there is nothing after chapter 3 yet, since it got released in 2021/06/05 --- 

While im a vanilla fan, I also saw some non-vanilla (which some have ntr) only for the art, so I avoid the braindead plot and see the jap or chinese version. -- 

Maybe @GooglemeBitch saw that somewhere, so please direct me where, but without any other info, its still early to say this will be NTR. --

That being said, this artist DID in the past publish NTR, so he has some brain damage, which could sadly lead this story into the shitty path.
thanks for the heads up, guess ill stop here. part 2 still epic though!
@googlemebitch  Where did you find the rest of the story ?

Spoilers, this is NTR the guy in th thumbnail is (CEO Ulese) head of the modelling agency and the reason the Mc thinks he recognised the ageny rep from chapter 1, was because she was a schoolmate of his who became a model. She had a crush on the Mc but never told him, she gives the Fmc bad advice she says if you want to keep your man interested you have got to learn how to please him. Hentai logic, the Fmc practices blowjobs on the chef from chapter 3 for the Mc's sake. Then the agency rep tells the Mc that the Fmc is cheating. This leads you to believe the rep still likes the Mc. But no turns out she got made a sexslave to the CEO thats why she never confessed to him. Then the rep makes a move on the Mc and makes sure the Fmc see's it. This makes the Fmc run to the CEO guy and become a slave to his dick. Then the rep leads the Mc to a room were Fmc is getting banged by CEO, Typical NTR ending pain and despair. Even if it gets there in a more interesting way it's the same old shit.
Still wary of the rest of this...
